game.name: NecroTactics
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: An auto-battler roguelite where you build your own base & undead army! Draft your army, equip units and place towers to annihilate your opponent in seconds.
game.shortDescriptionEn: An auto-battler roguelite where you build your own base & undead army! Draft your army, equip units and place towers to annihilate your opponent in seconds.
